sentences.en: Fisher was behind bars last night, charged with attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 由于被指控犯有谋杀未遂罪，费希尔昨晚进了监狱。

sentences.en: If you have any questions, please call Anne Fisher at 555-6203 during office hours.
sentences.cn: 如有疑问，请在办公时间致电555-6203找安妮·费希尔。

sentences.en: Turning around, the fisher folk saw Pinocchio dive into the sea and heard him cry out, "I'll save him!"
sentences.cn: 渔夫们转过身来，看见皮诺乔跳进海里，听到他大叫：“我要救他！”
